title: (x) Fairy Tales n Dreams - Stonecross {Mike Y}
content: i just reformatted my pc and lost all my fonts cause i'm retarded. anyways i was in the middle of workin on this [http://www.geocities.com/fairytalesndreams](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122501/http:/www.geocities.com/fairytalesndreams) when i lost my fonts, i don't know the name of the big font in the middle was hoping someone could help me out.
author: nicezombie

comments.content:
The font looks like Stonecross from Scriptorium. The attached sample is from my Script Guide (Part 4).   
The font is sold at Scriptorium, or MyFonts.   
 ![Stonecross sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122501im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23139.gif)
Man, now that you say that, I recall that name, thanks a bunch...i would have never come up with that on my own and i was having some difficulty locating it.
